description: deep bowl with two levels and foot ring; top level has four rows of small holes and a large center hole; bottom is solid; opening on side for drainage of lower section; floral motifs on sides with a bird on branch below drain; second bird approx. 6" to right of drain; floral motifs along edge of top; radiating lines from center around holes in top; brown edge on rim
markings: on bottom, in blue: [IF (?)]; on bottom, on label: [41D]; on bottom: collector\'s label
title: Collander bowl
